name: Notion Student Dashboard Template
description: The All-in-one Student Dashboard to organize all of your courses, budgets, notes and assignments.Never worry about a missing or overdue assignment again.How do I manage my time between ghostwriting, coaching, school, assignments and my family?The secret is this template.If you're a student who wants to streamline their workflow and take back hours of free time, this is for you.What's included?Courses organization with notes and resourcesWeekly overview schedule Calendar overlooking assignments a
features: Courses organization with notes and resources; Weekly overview schedule; Calendar overlooking assignments and exams; Easy sorting and storage; Quick notes feature for on-the-go; Assignment organization; Budgeting system; Transaction list; Customizable design; Club pages for extracurriculars
